summary: Craftable and improvable fist weapons. Even levels One-Handed!
descriptionHtml:
I didn't like how any of the other monk/punch mods on the nexus added more that just a simple unarmed style. So I made a simple weapon set, they are equipped on both hands (for ease of use).

*Levels One-Handed and even works with several perks (likely to conflict with any perk mods)
Armsman all lvls
Bone Breaker all lvls
Dual Flurry (should be working)
Dual Savagery
Fighting Stance

*Stats are identical to daggers of their type in base damage.


*Materials:
Iron
Steel
Orcish
Dwarven
Elven
Glass
Ebony
Daedric
Dragon Bone (Dawnguard Req.)
author: RakuOA
